title: Mafia / Queenpin LeBlanc Skin Concept by Riot Hylia

embed.description: gt; Owner, proprietress and singer at the ritzy Noxian nightclub “The Black Rose,” LeBlanc’s taste for glamour and intrigue made her a natural fit for the higher end of organized crime. Rarely dirtying her own hands, LeBlanc’s operation serves as a front for the syndicate sh

body:
Hey guys, this is a post about Mafia / Queenpin LeBlanc skin concept made by [Riot Hylia](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Riot%20Hylia), was posted around 2 years ago. _(Link in this post) _ 
As this skin concept about **LeBlanc**  is fresh and _also linked_ to the other 'Mafia' skins in LoL as mentioned in the linked post, I strongly feel that it should be made into a skin for the game. Besides, she has **yet to receive a skin for a long time** too and she **doesn't have any Legendary / Ultimate skins** so she qualifies for a new skin too. 
The ideas and artworks by [Riot Hylia](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Riot%20Hylia) are also clearly represented in aspect of Splash Art and In-Game model so all the more this LeBlanc skin concept should be carefully considered to be made into a real skin, also putting in the thought of how much time and effort [Riot Hylia](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/NA/Riot%20Hylia) has actually put in to be able to come up with this skin concept. _(P.S. Even the concept art for the 'Clone' is made!)_

~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~ ~ ~ {{champion:7}} ~

C'mon Riot, please make this skin a real thing. It has potential and everything that makes her qualified to get a new skin is also done.
